page.syntax: File_Attributes as C = A5_FileAttributeHelp( Default_Selection as C )

argument.name: File_Attributes
argument.description: One or more file attributes to be used as arguments in a TABLE.OPEN().

argument.name: Default_Selection
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The initial selection to display in the dialog box.

page.description: Displays a dialog and returns attribute codes.
page.discussion: The A5_FileAttributeHelp() function displays the FileFind Attribute Codes dialog and returns the selected attribute codes. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
